skillTree.localised_description: The Maiden of the Black Lotus spreads her corruption atop this unholy structure, causing the magic winds to contort and twist in eerie fashion in her midst.

effects.description: Mount: Haunted Shrine

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when within 60 metres of a Yang unit.
Effect intensity increases by highest nearby Harmony multiplier on a unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Religious icons, although having been long tainted by evil, still possess some sort of protective power, albeit faint.

effects.description: Ward save: 6%
Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: A macabre parade of balefire and haunting chants often herald the coming of Hei Lianhua, twisting the winds of magic into a sinister spectrum.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: +30% for all enemy spellcasters
	(local region)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +20%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hei Lianhua's mortal body seeps with the black taint that used to be sealed within her. Her presence can wither even the most sacred of grounds.

effects.description:
Attrition: +30% casualties suffered from Vampiric territory attrition
	(enemy armies in local province)

Vampiric corruption: +4
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: The dark maiden of Nongchang has fostered a growing cult willing to spread her aura of death across Cathay, despite her lack of sentience to acknowledge its existence.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Chanters and Chanters (Occult Lanterns) units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description:
Attribute: Unbreakable for Chanters and Chanters (Occult Lanterns) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The tale of the Maiden of the Black Lotus is as perhaps as old as the weathered terracotta sentinels that dot Cathay's landscape, and indeed it has cultivated a history of fear, enough for the locals to form traditions around its legend.

effects.description:
Control: +5
	(local province)

Control: +4
	(all adjacent provinces)

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Cathay
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The terrible host of ghosts and supernatural entities that flock upon Hei Lianhua bring great dread and gloom upon any pitiable township unfortunate to be in the vicinity.

effects.description:
Attribute: "Causes Terror" for Hungry Ghost units
	(Lord's army)

Control: -6
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: Hei Lianhua, unwillingly, has become the avatar of all the evils that resides deep within Nongchang's murky waters and of its people; every sin and every grudge, it is a festering cancer that continues to gnaw at Grand Cathay to this day.

effects.description: Ability: "All The Evils of Nongchang"
Replaces ability: "Taint of the Black Lotus"

skillTree.localised_description: A colossal phantasm from the dark waters of Nongchang is summoned; said to be manifested from the corrupted husk of the high priest, an Elder Wuxing Sage, who originally sacrified Hei Lianhua to banish the evils from the land.

effects.description: Mount: Avatar of Profane Sin

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when within 60 metres of a Yang unit.
Effect intensity increases by highest nearby Harmony multiplier on a unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The necromancer recites from forbidden scrolls an ancient rite used to trap and bind wandering spirits into a chosen corpse, thereby enslaving the creature in undeath.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Overcast spell: "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Overcast spell: "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A rusty bell is rang and hateful spirits of the dead are roused from the underworld, clawing and howling, upon the mortal realm.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Call From the Beyond"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Call From the Beyond"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Call From the Beyond" and "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Range: +50% to "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Power of Yin"

skillTree.localised_description: The victim's ancestors erupt from their ancient graves, sapping away their bravado with thoughts of guilt and despair as they get dragged into the afterlife.

effects.description: Cooldown: -20% to "Ancestral Haunt"
Overcast spell: "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Miscast chance: -50% to "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Ancestral Haunt"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Ancestral Haunt"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Although renowned for miraculous life magicks, mystical Weng-Chang was also home to a darker manipulation of the jade winds.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to "Curse of Weng-Chang"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Cooldown: -20% to "Curse of Weng-Chang"

Effect range: +10 to "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Evasion"

skillTree.localised_description: Outstretching both gnarled hands, the jade-blooded vampire drains its victim's spirit, leaving an empty, withered husk.

effects.description: Cooldown: -20% to "Soul Vampirism"
Overcast spell: "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Soul Vampirism"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Soul Vampirism"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Range: +50 to "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A small rift to the afterlife is opened by the sorceror, drawing forth the attention of powerful spirits that reside within.

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

Ability: "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

Cooldown: -50% to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

Ability: "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

effects.description: Passive ability: "Greater Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "A wall of decaying flesh and bone slowly advanced towards us, implacable and utterly remorseless."

skillTree.localised_description: All manners of bogeys and fiends that lurk in the dark wood, idling patiently as the sun sets into the horizon -- and the night begins.

Speed: +5% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units

skillTree.localised_description: In the East, tales of ghosts are often brought up to scare and discipline children or spread around as petty entertainment, but in crumbling abodes and forgotten clanhouses, lingering spirits exist, languishing in murderous rage.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Cathayan underworld is home to many immetarial creatures, and some of these aren't as benevolent as Cathay's venerated ancestors.

Physical resistance: +6% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units

skillTree.localised_description: "Charge, brothers! We are sworn-comrades in life, and now, in DEATH! For Xen Yang! For the Dragon Emperor!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Grandy Cathay is home to many supernatural abominations that stalk the night and maliciously feast upon the populace's nightmares.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Magical Animus"

skillTree.localised_description: The endurance of boogeymen and other nightly frights that haunt the Cathayan psyche is perhaps one of the more intriguing aspects of their culture.

effects.description:
Armour +8 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Not only satisfied in enacting revenge, some spirits go as far as to inflict misery and torment upon the living out of misplaced wrath and perceived injustices.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: At sunset, when all the windows are barred and the crows have cawwed, the dread denizens of the night encroach upon the world of mortals from the shadows.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Fell bats, Gore Hags, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Deathless horses with eyes that burn like brimstone and hooves that leave trails of ghostflame; the jade banner flashes its accursed colors.

Missile resistance: +15% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.
